description:
Full interview coming Tuesday, Nov 12!  Alan Lee chats about having to paint through a power outage & redoing some of his pieces for the new @TheFolioSociety Limited Edition of The Hobbit!

This signed limited edition will have 1000 copies and goes on sale November 19!  Check it out here: https://www.foliosociety.com/usa/the-hobbit-limited-edition.html?srsltid=AfmBOopysBo1IHO0UMjtsIKMYmQkraZv6P4SWecjfSjzaZQdoQ4RfCL_

#shorts #alanlee #thehobbit
title: Alan Lee painted in a power outage [INTERVIEW PREVIEW]
